mapper.update: update t_shops set deliveredDate = #{delivereddate,jdbcType=DATE}, shopsTotalArea = #{shopstotalarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shopsNumber = #{shopsnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, averagePrice = #{averageprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, buildingId = #{buildingid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where shopsId = #{shopsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select shopsId, deliveredDate, shopsTotalArea, shopsNumber, averagePrice, buildingId from t_shops
